all_questions.question: What position did the colleague attach the chest mic to his body?
all_questions.context: So here is an illustration of what a colleague of mine did when he was presenting in one of our test sessions.

all_questions.question: How did this position affect the sound volume and clarity during the presentation?
all_questions.context: And this distance, like talking in the wrong direction, has decreased the sound volume and the clarity of the sound.

all_questions.question: What was the consequence of the colleague's action on his presentation?
Why do you think the colleague attached the mic in this way?
What advice can be inferred for a presenter to improve their audio quality?
